chapters.title: Chapter 10: Secrets
chapters.info: Galadedrid (Galad) Damodred, p. 131 (100)—A young man from Caemlyn, son of Taringail Damodred and his first wife, Tigraine, and half-brother to Elayne and Gawyn. He is studying with the Warders in the White Tower, and is their star pupil. He is stunningly handsome, and has a crush on Egwene. See also al'Vere, Egwene; Damodred, Taringail; Damodred, Tigraine; Trakand, Elayne; Trakand, Gawyn; Trakand, Morgase.
